projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of projects that demonstrate my skills and interest in software development.

project_list.title: Homelab (Home Server)
project_list.desc: Implementation of a home server for hosting personal projects (web server) as well as securing my home network (OpnSense) and virtualization (Proxmox).

project_list.title: Metavision - Image Recognition
project_list.desc: Development of a web application with microservice architecture for facial recognition using OpenCV, RabbitMQ and ASP.NET Web API

project_list.title: Portfolio Website
project_list.desc: Development of my responsive website using Vue, Docker and GitHub Actions for automatic deployment.

project_list.title: Task Management
project_list.desc: Development of a simple task management application based on the LEMP stack

project_list.title: Online Quiz with ESP32
project_list.desc: Development of an online quiz where an ESP32 microcontroller is used as a buzzer. We use WebSocket as well as JavaScript, PHP and Redis for caching

project_list.title: Online Library
project_list.desc: Development of a web application (library) using Java Server, Contexts and Dependency Injection, Hibernate and MySQL.
